org.vadere.simulator.models

Class SubModelBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vadere.simulator.models.SubModelBuilder

  • public class SubModelBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to build submodels of a main model and add them to a ActiveCallback list.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SubModelBuilder(java.util.List<Attributes> modelAttributesList, Topography topography, AttributesAgent attributesAgent, java.util.Random random)
      Constructor of the SubModelBuilder, setting all field neccessary to create Model instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addSubModelsToActiveCallbacks(java.util.List<ActiveCallback> activeCallbacks)
      Add submodels to a ActiveCallback list.
      void buildSubModels(java.util.List<java.lang.String> subModelClassNames)
      Initializes all Model instances by calling Model.initialize(List, Topography, AttributesAgent, Random).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • SubModelBuilder

        public SubModelBuilder(java.util.List<Attributes> modelAttributesList,
                       Topography topography,
                       AttributesAgent attributesAgent,
                       java.util.Random random)
        Constructor of the SubModelBuilder, setting all field neccessary to create Model instances.
        Parameters:
        modelAttributesList - all available Attributes.
        topography - the scenarios Topography.
        attributesAgent - the AttributesAgent attributes of the agents.
        random - the Random instance.

    • Method Detail

      • buildSubModels

        public void buildSubModels(java.util.List<java.lang.String> subModelClassNames)
        Initializes all Model instances by calling Model.initialize(List, Topography, AttributesAgent, Random). This is necessary before using the Model instances.
        Parameters:
        subModelClassNames - List of class names. Used to instantiate object instances.

      • addSubModelsToActiveCallbacks

        public void addSubModelsToActiveCallbacks(java.util.List<ActiveCallback> activeCallbacks)
        Add submodels to a ActiveCallback list. This enables to update the models by update calls to the list of ActiveCallback. Maybe in future getSubModels() instead? Currently, this is the best way to avoid redundancy of adding them to the list.
